response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's true value and my objective to ensure a fair return on investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
